name: The Pumpkintini
description: This beautiful Halloween cocktail mixes up cinnamon, rum, and pumpkin flavors, and is guaranteed to put some smiles on all of your ghoulish faces.

ingredients.ingredient: Rim: Caramel Syrup, Graham Cracker Crumbs

directions: Rim edge of a martini glass with caramel syrup and graham cracker crumbs.
In a shaker with ice, combine ingredients and shake thoroughly.
Strain mix into rimmed glass and top with whipped cream and sprinkles.
